page.title: 14CHILDRENS' GAMES
page.content: THE GAME IS CALLED{MURDERBALL.}IT CONSISTS OF ONLY ONE RULE. IT CAN GET ROUGH AT TIMES.THE OBJECT OF THE GAME IS TO TOUCH A BALL DOWN IN THE MIDDLE OF 2 POSTS BUT TO DO THAT YOU HAVE TO FIGHT YOUR WAY THROUGH ABOUT 10 PEOPLE. THE 2 POSTS ARE AT THE OPPOSITE END OF THE COURT FROM YOUR TEAM.YOU ARE ALLOWED TO GO BEHIND BOTH GOALS BUT YOU CAN'T SCORE FROM BEHIND THE GOAL.THERE IS A LOT OF VIOLENCE AND A FEW PEOPLE GET{HURT!}THE STRONGEST SIDE ALWAYS WINS.WE REALLY TOOK THE IDEA FROM RUGBY.YOU CAN HIT OR KICK ANYONE ANYWHERE IN THE BODY BUT IF YOU DO IT TOO MUCH YOU GET SENT OFF FOR TWO MINUTES.SOMETIMES PEOPLE GET BRUISED AND ARE ALLOWED A REST OF ABOUT THREE MINUTES.
